featured.text: They made him pay them for the recordings.
In the future when the population grows, there will be no need for the recording because the howler monkeys will have more reason to check in with the neighbors to define their own territories.
They wanted him to destroy the recordings he had made.
When the deer hear a combination of a 3-second- long recording of a deer’s snort and 20 seconds of a barking dog, they panic and flee rapidly.

definition.zh_def: 錄音；記錄的過程或結果
definition.en_def: The act of capturing sound or video for playback or storage.
definition.example: I made a recording of the concert to share with my friends.
